properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Little Creek VA to Cape Henry VA including the Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 7 at 7:01PM EST until February 8 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with a few gusts up to 35 kt and
waves 2 to 5 ft.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from Little Creek VA to Cape Henry VA
including the Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel.

* WHEN...Until 5 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EST SATURDAY... ...GALE WARNING HAS EXPIRED
